name: Wonder Park Magic Rides Game
description:
Bring your IMAGINATION to life and join June and the Mascots in an all-new Wonderland that is entirely your own!


BUILD your Park, create RIDES, host VISITORS, cook FOOD, solve MYSTERIES and much more in the new official PARK BUILDING game.


Wonder Park Magic Rides is an all-new game based on the NEW ANIMATED MOVIE “Wonder Park” from Paramount Pictures! Create your own Wonderland theme park, customize it with rides and attractions, then collect all your favorite Wonderchimps.


When the Park is built, you get to manage it like a real tycoon! Collect, craft and sell items like food and gifts to keep visitors coming back for more. Go on hundreds of fun QUESTS to unlock even more!


Your Wonderland theme park awaits – download Wonder Park Magic Rides today!


Wonder Park Features:


LIVE THE MAGIC OF WONDERLAND
- June and her friends bring you along for a WONDERFUL ride!
- Collect all the “Wonder Park” characters and interact with them to learn more about their lives.
- Create the theme park of your dreams, just like in the movie!
- Maybe you’ll stumble upon a MYSTERY or two...


BUILD YOUR OWN WONDERLAND
- With hundreds of attractions and decorations to choose from, you have all you need to make your Park a thing of wonder.
- Build Roller Coasters, Ferris Wheels, Flying Chair Rides and so much more!
- No two Parks are the same!


COOK DELICIOUS FOOD
- Collect ingredients and create Amusement Park staples like Popcorn, Candy Apples, Ice Cream, Burgers and more!


ENTERTAIN VISITORS
- Craft items and souvenirs to keep visitors happy!
- Talk to your visitors and go on quests to make their dreams come true.
- Watch visitors go on the rides you build, all fully animated!


COLLECT THEM ALL!
- Add all your favorite WonderChimps to your Park!
- There are many to collect, and more will be added regularly.
- Don’t worry… The rumors of Chimpanzombies are probably not true!


Create the theme park of your dreams in Wonder Park! Download now!


CONNECT WITH US!
